name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer, but not guaranteed to be a number)
description: Description: The ID of the account in the database.

name: username
description: Description: The username of the account.

name: domain
type: Type: NULLABLE String, or null for local accounts
description: Description: The domain of the account, if it is remote.

name: created_at
description: Description: When the account was first discovered.

name: email
description: Description: The email address associated with the account.

name: ip
description: Description: The IP address last used to login to this account.

name: ips
description: Description: All known IP addresses associated with this account.

name: locale
type: Type: String (ISO 639 Part 1 two-letter language code)
description: Description: The locale of the account.

name: invite_request
description: Description: The reason given when requesting an invite (for instances that require manual approval of registrations)

name: role
description: Description: The current role of the account.

name: confirmed
description: Description: Whether the account has confirmed their email address.

name: approved
description: Description: Whether the account is currently approved.

name: disabled
description: Description: Whether the account is currently disabled.
